//URL : "http://www.codechef.com/problems/CDWRS06"

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	int noOfCustomers;
	cin >> noOfCustomers;
	int noOfQueries;
	std::vector<int> amount(noOfCustomers);
	cin >> noOfQueries;
	string query;
	int customer, money;
	while (noOfQueries--) {
		cin >> query;
		if (query.compare("UPDATE") == 0) {
			cin >> customer >> money;
			for (int i = 1; i*customer <= noOfCustomers; ++i) {
				amount[i*customer] += money;
			}
		} else if (query.compare("ASK") == 0) {
			cin >> customer;
			cout << amount[customer] << endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
